statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, purchase_history FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com' OR email_address LIKE '%@yahoo.com';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE purchase_history->'$.amount' > 1000 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN marketing_campaigns ON customers.id = marketing_campaigns.id WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_amount FROM Purchases WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_customers FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-03-15';
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, addresses.city FROM customers INNER JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_type FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT p.product_name, p.price, c.name AS customer_name, s.subscription_type FROM purchases p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN subscriptions s ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE p.price > 100 ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT a.street, a.city, a.state, a.zip_code, c.name AS customer_name FROM addresses a JOIN customers c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE a.zip_code LIKE '90%' ORDER BY a.city;

SELECT f.rating, f.comments, c.name AS customer_name FROM feedback f JOIN customers c ON f.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE f.rating >= 4 AND f.feedback_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY f.rating DESC, f.feedback_date ASC;
